topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Alpha: Deploying the Networking Patch

body.p: After launching the hdeploy command,, deploy the following patch.

ol.li: Copy the nuage_restproxy.py.diff.gz file to the /tmp/ directroy on all three controller nodes
SSH to each controller node as the cghelion user.

Use sudo to get root shell:
sudo su -

Change to the following directory:
cd /opt/stack/venvs/neutron/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nuagenetlib/

Execute the following command to deploy the patch:
zcat /tmp/nuage_restproxy.py.diff.gz | patch
Upon completion, the following message displays:
patching file restproxy.py

Perform these steps on the remaining servers.
Make sure the neutron-server status is active and running on all three controllers. If neutron-server is in failed state, restart service using “service neutron-server restart”

body.p: Return to the KVM + ESX installation.
